DOC.detailed_description: Subjects enrol 12-wk , double blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , clinical trial admit residential facility North Little Rock ( RCA-NLR ) randomize depressive symptom severity receive one following : sertraline alone ( 200 mg/day ) , sertraline ( 200 mg/day ) plus gabapentin ( 1200 mg/day ) , placebo . Subjects expect participate Substance Abuse Day Treatment Program reside RCA-NLR induct onto maintenance dose study medication ( week 1-2 ) . When participant transfer Outpatient Treatment Research Unit ( TRU ) start third week , continue receive study medication placebo ( week 3-12 ) expect participate weekly individual cognitive behavioral therapy . Supervised urines vital sign obtain thrice weekly ; self-reported adverse effect , mood drug use self-reports obtained weekly . At end 12 week , participant taper study medication five-day period , discharge study , refer appropriate treatment treatment/research program community interested .
